trial_type.Description: Identifier of trial with the format: {trial nr}{stim ID}{expression}

face_id.Description: Face ID used in the London Face Database

face_eth.Description: Ethnicity of face as recorded in the London Face Database

catch.Description: Whether the trial was a catch trial (i.e., followed by a rating) or not

rating_score.Description: In case of a catch trial, the actual rating given by the participant, ranging from -4 (not at all) to 4 (very much)

response_hand.Description: Hand which the participant responded with

average_attractiveness.Description: Attractiveness score of face from average rating taken from the London Face Database metadata

subject_attractiveness.Description: Attractiveness of face rated by the participant him/herself (average across 4 rating scores)

subject_dominance.Description: Dominance of face rated by the participant him/herself (average across 4 rating scores)

subject_trustworthiness.Description: Trustworthiness of face rated by the participant him/herself (average across 4 rating scores)
